statements: SELECT user_id, age, gender, location, purchase_history FROM demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT user_id, location, age FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE age < 40 AND gender='Male'
SELECT location, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM demographics GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY age;

SELECT user_id, gender, location, JSON_EXTRACT(purchase_history, '$.total_purchases') AS total_purchases FROM demographics WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(purchase_history, '$.total_purchases') > 100 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40 AND (location = 'Chicago' OR location = 'Houston') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT username, gender FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT location FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY entry_id ASC
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM demographics
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT username, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT u.username, d.location FROM users u INNER JOIN demographics d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE u.age < 30 ORDER BY d.location DESC
SELECT u.username, d.income FROM users u LEFT JOIN demographics d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE d.income > 50000 ORDER BY u.username ASC
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users
SELECT username, age FROM users
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, message_text FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, income FROM demographics WHERE occupation = 'Engineer'
SELECT * FROM users JOIN demographics ON users.user_id = demographics.user_id
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, location, income, occupation FROM demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND income > 50000;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, m.message_text, d.location FROM users u JOIN messages m ON u.user_id = m.user_id JOIN demographics d ON u.user_id = d.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users, SUM(income) AS total_income FROM demographics;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, location FROM demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, d.location FROM users u JOIN demographics d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE d.occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT s.segment_name, s.criteria, u.first_name, u.last_name FROM segmentation s JOIN users u ON s.segment_id = u.user_id WHERE s.criteria LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, location FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, education_level, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT segment_name, target_size, conversion_rate FROM segmentation ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, location FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY gender ASC, username DESC
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp, user_id FROM messages WHERE LENGTH(message_text) > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT conversation_id, start_time, end_time, total_messages, success_rate FROM conversations WHERE total_messages >= 10 AND success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT user_id, education_level, income, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC, education_level ASC
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, criteria, target_size FROM segmentation WHERE target_size BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, segment_name ASC
